amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Department of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology, Construction of Research Facilities account by $10 million and transfer the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 260 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds in the Department of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology, Construction of Research Facilities by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 247 (Roll no. 52).
